title: How to Travel from Orgrimmar to Silvermoon City in World of Warcraft

steps.title: Head to the Orgrimmar Portal Room.
steps.content: Head to the Orgrimmar Portal Room. This is found under the front gate of Orgrimmar.

steps.title: Go in the main gate.
steps.content: Go in the main gate. From the Warchief's Room, head past the Auction House and Inn, and into the main gate.

steps.title: Take the steps down to your left.
steps.content: Take the steps down to your left.

steps.title: Continue into the main room for the portal to Silvermoon.
steps.content: Continue into the main room for the portal to Silvermoon. The portal will have an image of Silvermoon inside it, as well as two Blood Elves standing outside You can also mouse-over the portal and check that it says 'Silvermoon' in the tooltip.

steps.title: Enter the Ruins of Lordaeron, and head towards the courtyard in the center.
steps.content: Enter the Ruins of Lordaeron, and head towards the courtyard in the center. This is the first area you enter when you pass through the gates.

steps.title: Head towards the gazebo.
steps.content: Head towards the gazebo. You'll see a gazebo in the center of the courtyard. Head south towards the gazebo structure and then look to your right. Don't go deeper into Undercity (it's easy to get lost there) - The Orb of Translocation is found at the northern edge of the city, in the Ruins of Lordaeron.

steps.title: Head right from the central gazebo in the Ruins and walk up the staircase.
steps.content: Head right from the central gazebo in the Ruins and walk up the staircase.

steps.title: Enter the chamber at the top of the stairs.
steps.content: Enter the chamber at the top of the stairs. You'll see the Orb of Translocation at the center of the room, and will be able to click it to teleport to Silvermoon. The map coordinates of the Orb are 59,67 if you are having difficulty finding it. You will end up in the Inner Sanctum of the Sunfury Spire in Silvermoon City. If you need to get back to Undercity, you can follow the steps in reverse.

steps.title: Use the Portal Room.
steps.content: Use the Portal Room. The Portal Room in Orgrimmar serves as the primary hub for teleports and travelling across the various continents and worlds. There is a portal to every major area from each expansion. You can mouse over each portal to see where they go if you don't recognise the image of the city inside the portal.

steps.title: Follow a walkthrough.
steps.content: Follow a walkthrough. Your best bet for travelling to Silvermoon from exploring around the world is to head back to Orgrimmar, and then follow the first walkthrough to get to Silvermoon.
